strapiPost.title: Bikes in Need
strapiPost.content:
Two NWA nonprofits are partnering together to distribute bikes to those in need in the community.

  • The Non-profits: Pedal It Forward is an organization that collects used bikes, fixes them up, and gives them away through 60+ Pedal Partners. New Beginnings is a community of homes meant to be a restart facility to transition out of homelessness. 
  • The Partnership: Last week, Pedal It Forward donated 20 bikes to residents at New Beginnings. The housing community at New Beginnings is close to the Razorback Greenway, which makes the bikes a perfect tool to commute to jobs, social engagements, and back home.

Listen to the full KUAF story HERE.
